function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"The relationship between population density and the spread of COVID-19 virus","Impact":"Increased spread of COVID-19 virus in densely populated areas","Mitigation":"Implementing strategies for social distancing and reducing interactions in densely populated areas","Technologies":"Smart city technologies for monitoring and managing population density","People":"Residents in densely populated areas","Owner":"Local government and public health authorities"},{"Description":"Lack of sustainable and green buildings","Impact":"Higher greenhouse gas emissions and increased operating costs","Mitigation":"Investing in sustainable construction and green building technologies","Technologies":"Renewable energy systems, energy-efficient materials, and green building certifications","People":"General population and future generations","Owner":"Construction companies, architects, and building owners"},{"Description":"Intrinsic relationship between municipalities and reduced social interactions","Impact":"Potential for reduced effectiveness of public health initiatives","Mitigation":"Improving coordination and resource sharing between municipalities, and promoting consistent health guidelines","Technologies":"Communication and collaboration platforms for public health coordination","People":"Public health organizations and local government authorities","Owner":"Public health authorities and local government"}]}
